title: TOWIE's Shelby Tribble and Sam Mucklow spark ENGAGEMENT speculation after cryptic snap
text:
They have had an on-off romance since they were first pictured looking cosy in October 2018.

And now TOWIE's Shelby Tribble and Sam Mucklow have sparked engagement speculation after a cryptic Instagram snap on Saturday during their romantic Barbados getaway.

Sam, 27, took to the social media platform to share a loved-up snap of himself kissing Shelby as he captioned it: 'Who’s coming to the wedding then?' followed by a bride and groom emoji.

Engaged? TOWIE's Shelby Tribble and Sam Mucklow have sparked engagement speculation after a cryptic Instagram snap on Saturday during their romantic Barbados getaway

The reality star's followers and TOWIE co-stars were quick to comment on the post with Congratulations bro Tommy Mallet saying: 'Congratulations bro.'

Courtney Green sweetly gushed: 'I'm bridesmaid !!!'

Liam Gastby posted: 'Of course she was gonna say Yes!!!!!! Congrats you two ❤️.'

While one fan put: 'Your engaged ?? ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️.'

Cryptic: Sam, 27, took to the social media platform to share a loved-up snap of himself kissing Shelby as he captioned it: 'Who’s coming to the wedding then?' followed by a bride and groom emoji

Wedding bells? The reality star's followers and TOWIE co-stars were quick to comment on the post with Congratulations bro Tommy Mallet saying: 'Congratulations bro' (pictured over the summer)

And a different follower commented: 'Congratulations to you both,' followed by heart emojis.

MailOnline has contacted both Sam and Shelby's representatives for comment.

Shelby and Sam were first pictured getting cosy in October 2018, with the two going on to embark in a turbulent on-off romance.

In May, the brunette beauty reignited her turbulent romance with her on/off flame just weeks after calling it quits during an explosive row, which saw him call her a 's**g'.

Sweet: Courtney Green sweetly gushed: 'I'm bridesmaid !!!' while Liam Gastby posted: 'Of course she was gonna say Yes!!!!!! Congrats you two ❤️.'

Fans: While one fan put: 'Your engaged ?? ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️' and a different person put: 'Congratulations to you both'

While in August Shelby told MailOnline that she is planning a blissful future with Sam, with marriage and babies on the cards.

She said: 'For me personally we think about having babies, marriage. He’s got so many qualities that I love in a man and I know that he will make a great partner and dad because of how he is with me.

'He has so much to offer his work ethic, he works hard, he makes me laugh, caring and supportive.

'To me he’s an amazing man so why would I not see myself marrying and having kids with him. I really, really love him so of course that is the future. We want to get married and have kids. I definitely see that. I love him so so much.'

Discussing why she fell for Sam, the star continued: 'I do trust him, he makes me feel good about myself. Your partner is meant to bring out the best in you and I feel like we do bring out the best in each other and that in itself it won’t make you feel insecure.

Cosy: Shelby and Sam were first pictured getting cosy in October 2018, with the two going on to embark in a turbulent on-off romance (pictured over the summer)

'Some people do have a flirty personality at the end of the day, he comes home to me. That’s his personality. I trust him.

'The thing with me is me and Sam we were friends initially. I already know what Sam is all about so for me it’s a very different relationship. For me it’s a nice thing.'

Sam echoed her sentiments, saying: 'There's no secrets. We are thrilled. I had to calm down a little bit. I don’t go out as much. I’m done with that now. I’m 27, she’s 27.

'I want to live with her and I want to have kids and that soon. I’m very family based I’ve got six nieces and nephew. I wouldn’t say I’m ready for kids now but I would like to start paving that way. I’m heading in that direction. I’ve had enough of f**king about doing what I want when I want.'

On-off: In May, the brunette beauty reignited her turbulent romance with her on/off flame just weeks after calling it quits during an explosive row, which saw him call her a 's**g' (pictured in September)

Shelby has also boasted about their sizzling chemistry and sex life, she recently told The Sun: 'We have the best sex life, it is the best sex I've ever had.'

'He will be my husband, he comes from a big family and I love being a part of that, I have never ever said I wanted babies.

'I could never imagine it before, even when I was with someone for five years, but if I got pregnant tomorrow with Sam I would be happy, he will make the most amazing dad.'

Shelby added the couple have even decided on the name of their child if they have a boy.
description: Sam, 27, took to the social media platform to share a loved-up snap of himself kissing Shelby as he captioned it: 'Who's coming to the wedding then?' followed by a bride and groom emoji.
